ticket.title: text_area_tag does not sanitize id value
ticket.original-body:
The text_area_tag helper is the only tag helper that does not sanitize the name value that goes into the id field, leading to invalid XHTML when called like so: text_area_tag("test[1]") => <textarea name="test[1]" id="test[1]">
All the other xxx_tag helpers sanitize the value correctly to become id="test_1".
It's a an easy fix, text_area_tag is simply missing a call to sanitize_to_id(name) that should be put on line 260 of form_tag_helper.rb
